title: Most visited Smithsonian museums and institutions in the U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Smithsonian Museums in the x axis and Number of visits in millions in the y axis.

The maximum Number of visits in millions 6.2 is found at Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center and the minimum is found at S. Dillon Ripley Center where Smithsonian Museums is 0.13.
There is a difference of 6.07 between the maximum Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center and minimum Smithsonian Museums S. Dillon Ripley Center.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of visits in millions for 19 number of Smithsonian Museumss.
Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center has the highest Number of visits in millions and S. Dillon Ripley Center has the lowest Number of visits in millions.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Smithsonian Museums in the x axis and Number of visits in millions in the y axis.

The Number of visits in millions is appeared to be the highest at Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center and lowest at Smithsonian Museums S. Dillon Ripley Center.
Second maximum Number of visits in millions is found at Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum.
The highest Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center has 6.07 more Number of visits in millions than the lowest Smithsonian Museums S. Dillon Ripley Center.

Number of visits in millions at Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center is 6.2 , second place is National Air and Space Museum at 6.2, and thirdly is National Museum of Natural History at 4.8.
Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center, and National Air and Space Museum share the same value 6.2.
The average Number of visits in millions in all 19 Smithsonian Museumss is 1.9.
The Number of visits in millions is 36.01 if we add up values of all Smithsonian Museumss.
